column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column4: A unique ID for the well. Formats may vary, but this needs to be unique. MUST BE UNIQUE
The experiment name to which this well is a part of.
The exact well being recorded. Example: A01, G12
A brief description of the amount in the well. Example: +, -
The label given to the tube, if the well contents were transferred to a separate tube. Leave blank if not applicable.
Any additional comments about the well.
If the sample was selected using seed, provide the Seed ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a row, provide the Row ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a plant, provide the Plant ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a microbe, provide the Microbe ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a separate culture, provide the Culture ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a tissue, provide the Tissue ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the sample was selected from a specific plate, provide the Plate ID here. If not applicable leave blank.
